topic: Should European Union (EU) member countries be permitted to conduct nationwide votes on withdrawing from the EU when matters concerning their national independence and self-governance become contentious?

This approach not only fosters democratic participation but also ensures that the decisions made are reflective of the collective will of the people. By prioritizing national sovereignty, we uphold the values of autonomy and self-governance that are integral to the identity of European nations.
